name: Noox
introduce:
Noox is a Web3 reputation platform for Web3 users to mint badges based on on-chain actions. These badges will be Soulbound NFTs that cannot be transferred. In this way, the NFTs that people own are unique identifiers, and may be used as their on-chain identity to unlock new opportunities.
Noox's vision is to build a protocol that allows anyone to program arbitrary rules into a badge standard (e.g. # of tx, volume of tx, value of tx, type of action) and allow others to claim them if they’re eligible.
